alert.note: Alert for Butler (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 6:05PM EST until March 08 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. Great Miami River at Sidney. Great Miami River near Middletown. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River near Middletown. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water approaches structures south of Route 73 between Excello and the Great Miami River. This includes properties along Oxford Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
